problems.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
problems.description:
Given a string, find and print the longest palindromic substring. If multiple palindromes have the same maximum length, print the first one.

Input Format:
First line contains a string.

Output Format:
Print the longest palindromic substring.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
babad

Sample Output
bab

Sample Input
cbbd

Sample Output
bb

Explanation:
For "babad", the longest palindromic substrings are "bab" or "aba". Print the first one: "bab".
hintsList: Use expand around center technique. For each position, expand both odd-length and even-length palindromes. Keep track of the longest one.
